content:
I did have the whole thing from the cat command earlier, it was just truncated. This doesn't seem to be working. Can you give me something where I can do this all in the terminal? And I can just paste in the key to the cat command? This doesn't seem to be working for me for some reason.

jesse@pop-os:~$ nano ~/.ssh/id_ed25519
jesse@pop-os:~$ chmod 600 ~/.ssh/id_ed25519
jesse@pop-os:~$ eval "$(ssh-agent -s)"
Agent pid 523005
jesse@pop-os:~$ ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_ed25519
Error loading key "/home/jesse/.ssh/id_ed25519": error in libcrypto
jesse@pop-os:~$
